mdRecord.dcterms:title: 1890 Jacksonville Academy Normal Class
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Photograph, possibly using an albumen process, of the 1889 Jacksonville Academy Normal Class. People included in the photograph are as follows: Trigg Sowers (3rd row centered in door), Mallie (Eliza Ann) Gardner (3rd row right door jamb) next to her mother in head scarf, Aaron Sowers (3rd row 4th from right), Nettie Williams (2nd row, 2nd from right), noted: Lillie Dickerson (?) Williams (unmarked).
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Students
Teachers
Schools
mdRecord.dcterms:provenance: Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University. University Libraries
